topic.title: Handle Calls in Zoho CRM
topic.shortdesc: After integrating Yeastar Cloud PBX and Zoho CRM, you are empowered with features like click to call, inbound call pop-ups, outbound call pop-ups, and call journal in the Zoho CRM.

p.note: Make sure that the associated extension of Zoho user is registered on IP phone or soft phone, or you could not receive or make calls in Zoho CRM.

section.title: Handle incoming calls
section.p: When you receive an incoming call from a CRM contact, the associated extension rings and a Business Card of the contact pops up on the Zoho CRM web page.
You can quickly view the contact information and handles the call on your phone.

section.title: Click to call
section.p: You can quickly call your CRM contacts by clicking Phone button in the CRM.

ol.li:
On the Record's Details page, click the Phone icon beside the phone number.
The associated extension will ring first.

Pick up your phone to answer the call, then the PBX will call the CRM contact.
After the call is established, the Business Card of the contact pops up on the Zoho CRM web page.

section.title: Follow-up Activity
section.p: At the end of every call, you can do any or all of the following activities from the Call Ended window in Zoho CRM. These would automatically be associated to the respective record.

section.title: View Call logs
section.p: Calls made, received, missed and unanswered in Zoho CRM via Yeastar Cloud PBX are automatically logged in the Activitiesmodule.
